changelog: Fixed: Game now saves before version update refresh
Added offline connectivity checker with full-screen overlay
Enhanced Logs tab with filtering, search, export, and real-time updates
Redesigned Users tab with stats, filters, sorting, and detailed profiles
Added Gift Codes system for admins to create redeemable codes
Added Redeem Code feature in Settings modal for users
Redesigned Settings modal with organized sections and better UX
Anti-cheat now whitelists legitimate operations (gift codes, admin actions)
Fixed anti-cheat false positives for debugger and frame rate
Cloud save improvements for code redemption
Added confetti celebration effect on successful redemption
